testcase.name: Test 2CO checkout
testcase.system-out: Given user is already on Website Home Page 2CO..............................passed Then user navigates to sign up page 2CO.....................................passed Then user create a new ac count 2CO.........................................passed Then user is redirected to pricing page and choose a plan to pay 2CO........passed Then user is redirected to checkout page 2CO................................passed Then user proceed to pay with 2CO 2CO.......................................passed Then paypal popup appears and user navigates back to my account 2CO.........passed Then user deleted the account 2CO...........................................passed
